name: B1 (2021)
description:
B1 ( Survival Horror)

In search for Mollie, little sister, Pandora ends up at the mansion where she finds the house owner suspicious. Eerie atmosphere surrounding the entire mansion…Will Pandora be able to unravel the mysteries and secrets of the mansion and find Mollie?

Artist: Yerim Sim, Jiwon Jeong 

Programmer: Ahreum Won

Translator: JongChol Jeong
